record.field:
THE FAB FOUR: A NIGHT WITH THE BEATLES

Get ready, Brussels ‚Äì the legends are back! This 2025, the most iconic band in music history returns to the stage for a once-in-a-lifetime celebration of their legacy. THE FAB FOUR: A NIGHT WITH THE BEATLES brings the timeless magic of John, Paul, George, and Ringo to life in a spectacular live show, with all the energy, harmonies, and charisma that turned the world upside down.

From the anthemic ‚ÄúHey Jude‚Äù to the psychedelic swirl of ‚ÄúLucy in the Sky with Diamonds‚Äù, and the raw emotion of ‚ÄúLet It Be‚Äù, this concert is a journey through the soundtrack of generations. With dazzling visuals, vintage flair, and state-of-the-art sound, the band will revisit their most beloved albums ‚Äì from Rubber Soul to Abbey Road ‚Äì and remind us all why they changed the world, one chord at a time.

Special guest Yusuf / Cat Stevens will open the evening with an acoustic set of his greatest hits ‚Äì a perfect prelude to a night of nostalgia, rebellion, and harmony.

Don‚Äôt miss your chance to witness the musical revolution live ‚Äì in the city where love and music go hand in hand.

All you need is love‚Ä¶ and a ticket.

The Beatles Ultimate Fan Package includes:

  • One premium reserved seat near the stage

  • Early entry to the venue

  • Commemorative ticket and VIP laminate

  • Limited edition art print signed by the show‚Äôs creative director

  • Access to exclusive Beatles photo exhibition and memorabilia wall

  • On-site VIP concierge

The Beatles Collector Package includes:

  • One general admission ticket

  • Limited edition Beatles-themed tote bag

  • Exclusive tour merchandise item

  • Commemorative laminate

All packages are NON-REFUNDABLE and NON-TRANSFERABLE. Valid photo ID required for package pickup. Questions? Reach out to info@onemoretimevip.com.

A portion of proceeds from every ticket will support global music education initiatives through the Imagine Foundation ‚Äì because music should be for everyone.

üé∏ Let it be known ‚Äì The Beatles are back. Are you ready to twist and shout?

VULFPECK ‚Äì SCHVITZ TOUR 

The funk is coming home. After years of redefining groove with their DIY spirit, retro vibes, and irresistibly tight musicianship, Vulfpeck is finally bringing their full-force live show to Brussels on the Schvitz Tour ‚Äì and you don‚Äôt want to miss it.

Known for their explosive energy, crowd-fueled improvisation, and deadpan humor, Vulfpeck has built a global cult following without the help of labels or industry hype. Now, they‚Äôre hitting the road to celebrate their latest album Schvitz ‚Äì a record that blends vintage soul, minimalist funk, and the unmistakable Vulf charm that‚Äôs made them one of the most original acts of the decade.

Expect a night of thumping basslines from Joe Dart, groove sermons from Theo Katzman, musical wizardry from Jack Stratton, Cory Wong's surgical rhythm, and surprise guests guaranteed to blow the roof off. Brussels will schvitz.

Come for the funk. Stay for the vibes.

Minimalist stage. Maximalist joy.

Ticket Options

üéüÔ∏è VulfVIP Schvitz Experience

  • One premium front-section ticket

  • Early venue access + exclusive soundcheck hang

  • Limited edition Vulfpeck screen-printed poster

  • Official Schvitz Tour tote bag

  • Digital download of the full Brussels live set

  • Priority merch access

üéüÔ∏è General Admission

  • One standard entry ticket

  • Access to the full Vulfpeck live experience (dancing encouraged)

All tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable. You‚Äôll receive pickup instructions the week of the show. Bring your photo ID, your dancing shoes, and your towel ‚Äì things might get sweaty.

üï∫ Groove is in session. Are you schvitzing yet?

record.field:
THE ROLLING STONES ‚Äì STILL ROLLIN‚Äô TOUR 2025

They‚Äôve been rocking the world for over six decades, and they‚Äôre not done yet. This year, the Rolling Stones are back on the road with their explosive Still Rollin‚Äô Tour 2025, hitting Brussels for one night only in what promises to be a thunderous, unforgettable celebration of rock ‚Äòn‚Äô roll history.

With a setlist packed with anthems like Paint It Black, Start Me Up, Gimme Shelter, and Sympathy for the Devil, Mick, Keith, Ronnie, and the band will bring that signature Stones swagger, raw power, and ageless energy that only they can deliver. No gimmicks. No filler. Just timeless riffs, pounding drums, and the kind of stage presence that makes history every single night.

This is more than a concert ‚Äì it‚Äôs a living legacy.

Ticket Options

üî• Stones Gold Circle Package

  • One premium ticket in the exclusive Gold Circle front-of-stage area

  • Early entry with VIP check-in

  • Commemorative Still Rollin‚Äô tour laminate and lanyard

  • Limited edition Rolling Stones collector‚Äôs lithograph

  • Pre-show lounge access with complimentary drinks and snacks

  • Fast lane merch booth access

üé∏ General Admission

  • One standard entry ticket

  • Join the crowd, feel the earth shake, and be part of the legend

All tickets are final sale. No name changes, no refunds ‚Äì only rock. Detailed event info and pickup instructions will be sent via email before the show. ID required for package pickup.

‚ö° Legends don‚Äôt retire. They just keep rollin‚Äô.

Are you ready to hear the greatest rock band of all time‚Ä¶ live?
